body.name: Portable Mini Steam Iron Handheld Steamer for Clothes Travel Electric Ironing Machine Compact Size All in One 120V 1000W White (6.8 in)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 21 mins
features: 💧Lightweight and compact: Our Mini Steam Iron is small and portable, making it easy to pack in your luggage. It's perfect for travel and home use.

💧 Versatile: Our Mini Steam Iron has both dry and steam ironing modes, making it suitable for various fabrics such as cotton, linen, silk, and wool. It can give your clothes a neat and crisp look in no time! Plus, it features garment steamer and Flat Ironing Style 2-in-1, making it easy to iron all types of clothing. mini Ironing Machine

💧 High-quality heating element: Our Mini Steam Iron is equipped with a high-quality 1000W heating element that heats up quickly and maintains a constant temperature, ensuring perfect ironing results every time. Its fast steam output and 150ml water tank make ironing quick and efficient. Travel Steamer for Clothes

💧 Safe and reliable: Our Mini Steam Iron features anti-dry burn protection and automatic shut-off functions, ensuring safe and reliable use. Its handle can rotate 180 degrees, making it easy to use in any position. The cowhide texture gives it a stylish and durable look. Handheld Steamer for Clothes

💧 Easy to use: Our Mini Steam Iron is designed for ease of use. Its one-click opening makes it convenient and fast to fill the water tank, and the water cup accessories allow for convenient water supply. Its 1.7M long power cord provides flexibility and ease of movement. Plus, it comes with a portable cloth bag for convenient storage. Mini Steamer Iron

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great size works well!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to take on our cruise. Heats up super quick, easy to use and light weight. Make sure to use the stand it come with because after you’re done using it the left over water tends to leak out while it cools or just remember to empty it when you’re done using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer works like a charm. Lightweight, easy to use and VERY steamy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little steamer
reviews.reviewText: My only little issue is that mine drips a little, but it's a great little steamer and I like that it's portable and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It didn’t perform as expected
reviews.reviewText: It didn’t do what I thought it would do. It made my clothes more wetter than ironing. I haven’t used it but twice. It’s in the closet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars recommended this mini steam iron for travel usage
reviews.reviewText: I recently got this mini steam iron, and it's super compact, making it great for travel, and can handle different fabrics with its dual modes. It heats up fast and I appreciate the safety features like auto shut-off. The rotating handle and long cord make it easy to use, and the cowhide design adds a nice touch. It's a great deal for this price. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work
reviews.reviewText: I made the mistake of buying this and not using it before the return policy had ended. This item waterfalled water all over the floor and my clothes no matter what amount I filled it up. Then it gave steam for like 30 seconds before it was empty.
